address.addressline1: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Betsy Pittman in June 2006.

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.repository: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center.
did.unittitle: Edward A. Khairallah Papers.
did.abstract: The collection contains the professional papers of Edward A. Khairallah, Professor of Molecular and Cell Biology, at the University of Connecticut.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: A professor of Molecular and Cell Biology at the University of Connecticut. Dr. Khairallah died in 1996.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains the professional papers of Dr. Khairallah and includes reports, grants, class materials, publications, papers, presentations, articles and similar materials pertaining to his research interests.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection has only been inventoried at the box level at this time.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to the University, its history, administration, faculty, staff and students. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This record series is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: University of Connecticut--Faculty--Professional and personal papers.
Molecular biology--Study and teaching.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on this collection at this time. Upon request for access, the boxes will be reviewed to determine appropriate status of individual folders.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], Edward A. Khairallah Papers. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was donated by Dr. Lamia Khairallah in 1997.
